@txeriff

You're an idiot. read what you just said...

You: "Then EXPLAIN ME how you can play WoW to "unofficial" servers."

You see that last word there? Ya see it? It says SERVERS. You don't need a "crack" to play on the "unofficial" servers. you PATCH the game client to connect to someone else's SERVER. Thus, you're STILL PLAYING ON A SERVER. 

So therefore, your "point" is invalid. You can't play WoW without a server, and you CAN'T play Diablo 3 without one either. Someone may eventually find a way to emulate the server and maybe host one for their friends to play on so they dont have to buy the game, and maybe someone will find a way to run a locally hosted and emulated server (which would take a POWERFUL computer to do to begin with). 

So just suck it up and buy the game like alot of us have had to do. There wont be any "crack" for this game, and it'll be quite a long while before a server can be emulated since i can guarantee that no one "sympathetic" to pirates will have access to blizzards servers.
